mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.prj_num AS "prjNum", a.ticket_no AS "ticketNo", a.path AS "path", a.agency_agreement AS "agencyAgreement", a.area AS "area", a.money AS "money", a.pay_date AS "payDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tland_pay_ticket( name, prj_num, ticket_no, path, agency_agreement, area, money, pay_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{prjNum}, #{ticketNo}, #{path}, #{agencyAgreement}, #{area}, #{money}, #{payDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tland_pay_ticket SET name = #{name}, prj_num = #{prjNum}, ticket_no = #{ticketNo}, path = #{path}, agency_agreement = #{agencyAgreement}, area = #{area}, money = #{money}, pay_date = #{payDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
